faq.question: How detailed are the analyses?
faq.answer: Very detailed! Each section gets its own summary, key points, arguments, evidence, and critical evaluation. Analysis length typically matches 30-50% of original document length.

faq.question: Can I analyze technical or scientific papers?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Our AI is trained on academic and technical content, understanding complex terminology, methodologies, and scientific arguments.

faq.question: Does it identify strengths and weaknesses?
faq.answer: Yes! Critical analysis mode evaluates argument quality, evidence strength, methodology soundness, and logical consistency.

faq.question: How long does detailed analysis take?
faq.answer: Typically 1-2 minutes for standard papers, 3-5 minutes for lengthy documents. Much faster than manual analysis!

faq.question: Can I customize analysis focus?
faq.answer: Yes! Specify focus areas like methodology, findings, arguments, or implications. Pro plans offer custom analysis templates.
